title: Hereâ€™s Everything You Need To Know About Parineeti Chopraâ€™s Visit To Dubai
text:
facebook 
We all know that Parineeti Chopra was in Dubai but how many of us know why was she there and with whom? Well, we did a little research and dug out all the fun stuff from her trip for you. So, a couple of weeks ago, this Bollywood Diva went to her favourite vacation place for a delicious food trail with her bestie. She was on a much-needed vacation and has left us all drooling with her yummy Instagram videos and pictures. Just have a look! We are sure that it will leave you wanting to book flight tickets right away. 1. She arrived in Dubai all excited and, of course, looking fabulous. A post shared by Parineeti Chopra (@parineetichopra) on Jan 10, 2017 at 5:20am PST 2. Look how excited she got about Nutella Paratha and Suleimani Chai at Kite Beach. A post shared by Parineeti Chopra (@parineetichopra) on Jan 28, 2017 at 7:38am PST 3. We can safely say that she didn't miss any of her Bollywood drama at this restuarant. A post shared by Parineeti Chopra (@parineetichopra) on Jan 11, 2017 at 2:08am PST 4. Anybody would need a walk after such an elaborate and delicious brunch at Al Naseem. Breakfast under the shadow of @BurjAlArab. The indulgence in #MyDubai is on another level! @JumeirahAlNaseem this ain't the last you'll see of me ðŸ˜œ A post shared by Parineeti Chopra (@parineetichopra) on Jan 11, 2017 at 8:01am PST I'd eat my heart out if I had this beach to work it off on everyday! Living the dream, Dubai style. #discoveralnaseem A post shared by Parineeti Chopra (@parineetichopra) on Jan 11, 2017 at 9:40am PST 5. After giving the perfect sunset pose, Parineeti Chopra enjoyed her new favourite Emirati cuisine in desi style.
